name: Collin W.
alt: Collin rides down a granite slab on his hardcore hardtail.
text: The only drawback to ordering a Manzanita is that you will soon want a stable of them.

name: Rachel B.
alt: Rachel on a tour through the Marin Headlands.
text: I just got back from my first bikepacking trip and I was so grateful that I had my Manzanita to accompany me!

name: McCord B.
alt: McCord descends the Mount Hough trail on a bikepacking trip.
text: My new Manzanita is not only prettier than I could have ever imagined, but also rides like a dream!

name: Kevin B.
alt: Kevin B. shows off his new Manzanita hardtail.
text: The short story is in my 30 years of Mountain Biking this is the best bike I've ever owned.
